shrimp.name: Filterstep
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: val
output.description: value of step function at x

shrimp.usage: An antialiased step() function. It's similar to step(), but the result is filtered. If the optional max value is given, the result is filtered in the range between min and max. By default, max is unset (via "UND"(efined) symbol). The filter types are: "box", "triangle", "catmull-rom", and "gaussian". Pixie adds to these filters, the following: "sinc", "blackman-harris", "mitchell".
